section.title: File Type - Waypoints
section.p: XCSoar uses waypoint files written in the format designed by Cambridge Aero Instruments for their C302 instrument. Files are available from the Soaring Turnpoints section of the Soaring Server:
TODO: There are better mirrors than this one - see which is best. TODO: URL/Link http://acro.harvard.edu/SOARING/JL/TP
Several commercial and freely distributable programs exist for converting between different waypoint formats.
